_comments.design: MINIMAL CONFIG - only specifies WHICH entities and HOW to group them
_comments.emergent: Display names, icons, and value colors from EntityMetadataRegistry
_comments.minRole: Uses UserRole.priority from permission.dart (customer=1, technician=2, dispatcher=3, manager=4, admin=5)
_comments.groupBy: Field to group by for distribution chart (e.g., 'status')
